thread.title: BRIEF-‍Daiichi Sankyo And Darwinhealth Enter Exclusive Research Collaboration For Novel Cancer Target Initiative​

title: BRIEF-‍Daiichi Sankyo And Darwinhealth Enter Exclusive Research Collaboration For Novel Cancer Target Initiative​
text:
April 4, 2018 / 12:11 PM / in 26 minutes BRIEF-‍Daiichi Sankyo And Darwinhealth Enter Exclusive Research Collaboration For Novel Cancer Target Initiative​ Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - Daiichi Sankyo Co Ltd: 
* ‍DAIICHI SANKYO AND DARWINHEALTH ENTER EXCLUSIVE RESEARCH COLLABORATION FOR NOVEL CANCER TARGET INITIATIVE​ * ‍DARWINHEALTH WILL RECEIVE AN UPFRONT PAYMENT​ 
* ‍DARWINHEALTH HAS POTENTIAL TO RECEIVE MILESTONE PAYMENTS SHOULD SPECIFIED EVENTS OCCUR RELATING TO DARWINHEALTH’S NOVEL CANCER TARGETS​ 
* CO TO RECEIVE EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO DARWINHEALTH’S NOVEL CANCER TARGET DATABASE FOR PREDETERMINED AMOUNT OF TIME WITH OPTION TO EXTEND​ 
* ‍FINANCIAL TERMS OF AGREEMENT WERE NOT DISCLOSED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
